text: A quick message can make a big difference. With just three days left before Granite Staters head to the polls, here's one thing you can do right now to help Hillary Clinton—no matter where you live.Text NOTE to 47246 to tell a New Hampshire voter why you're standing with Hillary. People across the country have been sending messages of their own all day. Here are just a few:  Person-to-person contact makes a huge difference in tight races like this one. So make sure you text NOTE to 47246 to send your message to a Granite Stater today!
title: Press Release - One Simple Way You Can Help Hillary Clinton in New Hampshire—from Wherever You Are
